about_the_game: Every year Grandma cleans her basement in this addictive and unique tower defence. Lay down paths for demons to follow and destroy their portal before they destroy yours. 40 levels of dynamic gameplay.
detailed_description: Every year Grandma cleans her basement in this addictive and unique tower defence. Lay down paths for demons to follow and destroy their portal before they destroy yours. 40 levels of dynamic gameplay.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or later or SteamOS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or later or SteamOS

name: Grandma's In Hell Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 or later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 or later

short_description: Every year Grandma cleans her basement in this addictive and unique tower defence. Lay down paths for demons to follow and destroy their portal before they destroy yours. 40 levels of dynamic gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
